review: Too bad you can't save money by buying non-smart TVs anymore- it seems like they don't even make them. An Amazon Fire TV however puts even the best built in Smart TV features to shame.Out of the box it's very good- but if you invest some time learning how to side-load apps it becomes an excellent device very quickly. It serves all my media/entertainment needs besides cable/live tv.Two things I do wish it had though was a way to use the USB port to add extra memory and an IR port that would allow a standard universal remote to do basic controls. Since the remote is bluetooth no basic universal remote works with it.
